scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=main-shell" "npm run dev --workspace=dashboard" "npm run dev --workspace=profile" "npm run dev --workspace=settings" "npm run dev --workspace=user-api" "npm run dev --workspace=settings-api"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace=main-shell" "npm run start --workspace=dashboard" "npm run start --workspace=profile" "npm run start --workspace=settings" "npm run start --workspace=user-api" "npm run start --workspace=settings-api"
